dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confidently take center stage and assert their presence, commanding attention from others.
Your FarTwin will cautiously approach social interactions, preferring to observe and listen before contributing or taking action.

dimensions.label: Communication Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage in conversations with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk-taking situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly pursue high-risk opportunities, relishing the thrill of uncertainty and potential reward.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh risks and rewards before making a decision, prioritizing stability and security.

dimensions.label: Leadership Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin lead or guide others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assert their authority and expertise, making confident decisions that command respect from others.
Your FarTwin will work collaboratively with others, fostering a sense of teamwork and shared ownership to achieve common goals.

dimensions.label: Financial Decision-Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make financial decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize thriftiness and prudence, making cautious investments that balance risk and potential return.
Your FarTwin will be willing to take calculated risks with their finances, investing in opportunities that offer the potential for significant growth or rewards.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach data analysis and problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on empirical evidence and logical reasoning to inform their decisions, evaluating information systematically and objectively.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and gut feelings, making decisions based on hunches or instinctual impressions rather than cold, hard data.

dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge and skill acquisition?

options.description: Your FarTwin will work diligently to learn new skills, seeking out structured courses or mentorship to ensure thorough understanding.
Your FarTwin will be driven by a curiosity about the world, exploring topics and learning on their own terms rather than following a set curriculum.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on schedules, to-do lists, and detailed planning to stay organized and focused.
Your FarTwin will be more flexible and adaptable, prioritizing flexibility over structure and allowing tasks to unfold naturally.
